info.author: Tony Nelson
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
info.description:
Fastcharmap is about 5 times faster than Python's charmap routines.

Usage:  fastcharmap.hook('codec_name')

Fastcharmap inserts faster code that works when unicode() or "".encode
are called.  Installation requires a binary distribution or a C
compiler; Pyrex is required for changes to the source.  Python's
developers are working on faster charmap codecs for a future version of
Python; fastcharmap may be useful until then.
info.name: fastcharmap
info.summary: Faster (5x) charmap codec decode and encode in Pyrex
info.html_description:
Fastcharmap is about 5 times faster than Python’s charmap routines.

Usage: fastcharmap.hook(‘codec_name’)

Fastcharmap inserts faster code that works when unicode() or “”.encode are called. Installation requires a binary distribution or a C compiler; Pyrex is required for changes to the source. Python’s developers are working on faster charmap codecs for a future version of Python; fastcharmap may be useful until then.
